title: The concerned land owning authority shall give DRs of their land to DRP (SRA) in lieu of 70% of net premium that is payable by the developers, proportionate to the RRC generated on the said land
clause_text: The concerned land owning authority shall give DRs of their land to DRP (SRA) in lieu of 70% of net premium that is payable by the developers, proportionate to the RRC generated on the said land. In case project is to be undertaken by Public Authority, the premium payable shall be as decided by the Government.
